§ Atanaz Ostovar (Fediverse, Who is Who)

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Atanaz Ostovar** is a notable person on the Fediverse because —

• [[spacehost]], which is a fully-managed hosting provider for all the [[Fediverse]], for which she one was part of the team as a **quality assurance (QA) engineer**, and
• [[greatape]], which is [[fediverse/software]] focused on audio- and video- conversation, for which she one was part of the team as a **quality assurance (QA) engineer**.
